channel.title: Best hosting server base?
channel.description: Alright, it's time to start, I'm bored to use PI and add tutorials to it and saying to my friends that I made a rsps.. x) Which base should I choose to start coding my own server? :x the stablest but not the hardest

item.title: Best hosting server base?
item.dc:creator: @loruviam loruviam
item.description:
@loruviam wrote:

Pure_:

You need to study the language, try using java tutorials to start.

ooh i see… how much time approx it takes to get all in my mind?

Read full topic

item.title: Best hosting server base?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

You need to study the language, try using java tutorials to start.

Read full topic

item.title: Best hosting server base?
item.dc:creator: @loruviam loruviam
item.description:
@loruviam wrote:

[quote=“DAn0194, post:4, topic:539665”][quote author=loruviam link=topic=658506.msg4404713#msg4404713 date=1391554521]

Well Java is java so any base would pretty much be the same you would have to get used to the format it is in and then you should be fine. I recommend starting with a already good programmed base like hyperion or runesource.

alright thank you! but how do I start learning Hyperion?
[/quote]

What do you mean start learning Hyperion? Are you talking about how stuff is handled like npcs, players etc. If you are just read over some classes and then start programming little things into the server, you will start getting the hang of it.[/quote]

yeah this, thank you but I mean also… How I add my owns codes, or create mine… since all I did was following tutorials for PI

Read full topic

item.title: Best hosting server base?
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“loruviam, post:3, topic:539665”][quote author=DAn0194 link=topic=658506.msg4404708#msg4404708 date=1391554156]
Well Java is java so any base would pretty much be the same you would have to get used to the format it is in and then you should be fine. I recommend starting with a already good programmed base like hyperion or runesource.
[/quote]

alright thank you! but how do I start learning Hyperion?[/quote]

What do you mean start learning Hyperion? Are you talking about how stuff is handled like npcs, players etc. If you are just read over some classes and then start programming little things into the server, you will start getting the hang of it.

Read full topic
